main event: On March 24, 1954, three white lights were observed at Sampson AFB, New York.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 6 minutes,The objects were at an altitude of 8,000 feet and 10,000 feet away from observers,The lights were described to be stationary,The conclusion mentioned possibilities such as balloons, aircraft, or astronomical phenomena,The report indicated that there were reliable observers in the area.
sighted object: three white lights in the sky
